name: npm-scripts-starter
description: A minimalistic starter kit for front-end development using only npm-scripts. Includes scripts for Sass compilation, JavaScript bundling, image optimization, and file watching. Flexible and customizable using the package.json file. Perfect for developers who prefer a lightweight build system that relies only on the standard tools and features of npm

scripts.minify: minify   main.js  > main.min.js && minify  style.css > style.min.css
scripts.concat:js: mkdir -p dist/js && concat -o dist/js/scripts.js assets/js/test1.js assets/js/test2.js
scripts.concat: npm run concat:css && npm run concat:js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run concat:css && npm run cssmin
scripts.build:js: npm run concat:js && npm run uglify
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:img
